feed.title: Dockcheck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.4.0
entry.content:
New:

  • Added an export for node_exporter's text file collector to provide metrics to Prometheus by @tdralle in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/121
  • Finalized Prometheus addon by @mag37 in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/124

New Contributors:

  • @tdralle in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/121 - Thank you for the contribution and testing!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.3.0...v0.5.4.0

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.5.0
entry.content:
Fixes:

  • Compatibility with osx + bsd added and tested in PR #130
    • Rewritten dependency installer (jq + regctl) to a function instead of separate sections.

Big thanks to @pshannon-git for bringing issues to light and helping me test the builds.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.4.0...v0.5.5.0

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.6.0
entry.content:
New:

  • Added asynchronous update checking - heavily improved performance! by @Thaurin in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/128

Thank you very much @Thaurin, impressive improvements.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.5.0...v0.5.6.0

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.6.1 - Hotfix
entry.content:
Fixes:

  • Async Xargs hotfix by @mag37 in https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/pull/132
    • Defaulted subprocess to 1 with MaxAsync=1, increase to find a stable value in your environment.
    • Added -x N option to pass MaxAsync value at runtime.
    • To disable xargs -P flag (max processes) all together, set MaxAsync to 0.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.6.0...v0.5.6.1

entry.title: New release for Dockcheck: v0.5.7.0
entry.content:
New

  • Added function to send notification when dockcheck has an new update.
    • Will be sent when option -i together with -n or -y is used.
    • Manually migrate your current notification settings to a new template file.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mag37/dockcheck/compare/v0.5.6.1...v0.5.7.0
